mapper.insert: insert into transfer_request (service, sign_type, sign, charset, mer_id, version, order_id, mer_date, mer_account_id, partic_acc_type, trans_action,partic_user_id,partic_account_id,amount,request_url, request_data, request_time, status) values (#{service}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{charset}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{orderId}, #{merDate}, #{merAccountId}, #{particAccType}, #{transAction},#{particUserId}, #{particAccountId},#{amount},#{requestUrl}, #{requestData}, #{requestTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: update transfer_request set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into transfer_response (request_id, sign_type, sign, mer_Id, version, order_id, mer_date, trade_no, mer_check_date,ret_code, ret_msg, response_data, response_time) values (#{requestId}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{orderId}, #{merDate}, #{tradeNo},#{merCheckDate}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{responseData}, #{responseTime})
